job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Help shape the next generation of ecommerce for the next generation of consumer.
Platform Operations: Site Reliability Engineer
StockX is looking for Site Reliability Engineers to help us build and scale our platform from a data driven perspective. You’d join as a foundational member of our Platform Operations SRE team and have the opportunity to directly influence the roadmap and technology choices as we rapidly scale our team and infrastructure. You’ll be responsible for shaping and developing initiatives like our monitoring & alerting, telemetry & tracing infrastructure, and incident response.
What You Will Be Doing
Partnering with your teammates to:
Standardize the operational processes that drive the StockX platform
Define our incident response process and implement standardized tooling to support it
Run incident response efforts (incident commander and communication roles) as well conducting blameless post-incident reviews
Craft reliable methods to monitor critical vendors that integrate with the StockX platform
Foster a data driven culture that promotes quality and process improvement across the platform and with stakeholders
Partnering With Product And Engineering Teams To
Develop operational readiness requirements for StockX services and cloud infrastructure
Measure and optimize platform performance by implementing SLI/SLO/SLA across all of StockX's services
Help define how availability is measured across the StockX platform
Provide a holistic view of our platform health through service levels and business metrics
Partnering With Information Security To
Monitor the platform for security events/alerts related to potential or active threats
Maintain awareness of the global threat landscape by partnering with StockX Threat Intelligence team
Develop cyber security playbooks for various incident response scenarios
What We're Looking For
5+ years experience building and maintaining production systems with a focus on Devops or Site Reliability Engineering
Experience with:
cloud native infrastructure (+1 for AWS or Kubernetes)
infrastructure as code tooling (+1 for Terraform)
maintaining monitoring and alerting systems (+1 Datadog)
Comfortable triaging events & alerts, conducting threat assessments, and determining next steps (all based on internal controls and SOPs)
Ability to program with one or more high-level programming or scripting languages such as Python, Ruby, JavaScript, bash
A pragmatic problem-solver who can drive technical solutions that focus on our customers and business
A collaborative teammate that is comfortable in a fast paced environment
Someone comfortable working across teams such as: Engineering, Product, Design, IT, and Supply Chain Operations
A willingness to learn on the job and take on tasks as needed
Excellent communication skills
Ability to work independently and communicate over the chat or video chat software
About Us
Our global platform offers unprecedented access to current culture while our data-driven, bid-ask model provides buyers with the real-time visibility to know they’re getting a fair price. And, unlike other ecommerce sites, StockX hand-checks every purchase (20,000+ daily trades) at one of our regional authentication centers.
StockX’s special formula has rocketed the company to a multibillion dollar valuation, with 10M+ lifetime trades on the platform
—
more than half of those coming in the last year. And we’re just getting started.
